responses.text: I've been sent to ask about recent attacks on survivors by anomalous creatures.  Know anything about that?
[MISSION] I've been asked to help attract work for another community of survivors.  Know anyone who could help?

dynamic_line.yes: Makin' yourself useful, Marshal?  Well, it happens one of my supply caravans got hit recently, the survivors came back with stories of weird living shadows.  I guess I'll send along what they told me, just don't yourself killed.
dynamic_line.no: That sounds like something we've run afoul of a while back.  One of my supply caravans got ambushed by some creatures unlike what you normally see out there.  I'll send over the reports or whatever it is you're looking for.

dynamic_line: Got a lot of work that needs to be done as it is, and supplies that need moving.  I might be able to work something out with them.

responses.text: They're interested in trade contacts as well, so that might prove useful.

dynamic_line: Could work if I can spare the manpower, more variety should help keep the supply lines in good order.  Just give me directions.

responses.text: A local settlement in a fortified roadside church.  It's not too far from the refugee center.
On second thought, I might be back later.

dynamic_line: Sounds good to me.  I'll send word out and they should have contacts looking into it soon enough.  Hope this pans out.

responses.text: Thank you.  I should go check on them.
